data.title: superwhisper
data.description: AI powered voice to text for macOS
data.content:
superwhisper
===============

![Image 1: Leather Texture](https://superwhisper.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fleather-texture.b107c8ec.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Image 2: superwhisper-image](https://superwhisper.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhero-logo.08c64afa.png&w=3840&q=75)

Write 3x faster, without lifting a finger.
==========================================

superwhisper
------------

AI powered voice to text

Hey Rahul, excited to see wha

[![Image 3](https://superwhisper.com/_next/static/media/appstore.b3779af7.svg) Now available on iPhone](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/superwhisper/id6471464415)

[![Image 4](https://superwhisper.com/image/appstore-qr.png)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/superwhisper/id6471464415)

![Image 5](https://superwhisper.com/icon/apple.svg)

Install on iPhone

[![Image 6: play-icon](https://superwhisper.com/_next/static/media/play.e7f93065.svg) Watch demo](https://superwhisper.com/#demo-video)

![Image 7: Apple Logo](https://superwhisper.com/_next/static/media/apple.45d84897.svg)Download now

requires macOS 13+

Features

### 100+ Languages

It can translate them all to English, too.

### Use Custom Vocabulary

Allows you phrases, names, links, or acronyms.

### Private & Secure

Everything stays on your device.

### Offline First

Everything happens on your device, no WiFi needed.

### Use with any app

Works anywhere you can type or paste text. No need to switch apps.

Reviews

> I have replaced typing emails with dictating them using a client-side hosted version of Whisper.  
>   
> The app I'm using is called @superwhisperapp.  
>   
> It runs natively on macOS and integrates with the system clipboard.  
>   
> I highly recommend it.

>

Pricing

Free

*   ‚Ä¢ Basic features
*   ‚Ä¢ Unlimited use of small AI models
*   ‚Ä¢ 15 minutes of recordings using all Pro features
*   ‚Ä¢ Support for 100+ Languages
*   ‚Ä¢ Custom prompt controls

Pro

Student discount available

*   ‚Ä¢ All Pro features on Mac and iOS
*   ‚Ä¢ Use your own AI API keys
*   ‚Ä¢ Translate any language to English
*   ‚Ä¢ Transcribe audio and video files
*   ‚Ä¢ Priority support
*   ‚Ä¢ Unlimited use of Cloud & Local AI models

FAQ

Is there a free trial?

You can try the Pro features for 15 minutes free, after that the free tier features are available to you forever. The no questions asked refund within 30 days of purchase will always be honored.

Will it work on my Intel chip Mac?

Intel macs are best using the Nova 2 Cloud model. Offline models only run well on Apple Silicon macs.

What is being working on? When will _some feature_ be released?

Check out our [Roadmap & Feature Requests](https://superwhisper.userjot.com/) to see what is being worked on or request a new feature.

My dictation is not working/crashing/hanging... what do I do?

Make sure you have enabled all required permissions and moved the app to the Applications folder. Additionally, check your system audio input settings and make sure it is able to recognize your voice.

![Image 124: stars-image](https://superwhisper.com/icon/stars.svg)
